name: Buddy Shop
description:
'Welcome to the Buddy Shop. We make custom shells, while you wait.'

Buddy Shop is a dress up game. Little spirits visit your workshop in search of a corporeal shell. They'll tell you what they like or what they're doing, and it's up to you to make them a snazzy, durable new buddy body to live in. 

This version of Buddy Shop was made over 72 hours for the SA Game Jam 2019.
